 Percentage >= 80% : Grade B 
 Percentage >= 70% : Grade C 
 Percentage >= 60% : Grade D 
 Percentage >= 40% : Grade E 
 Percentage Less than 40% : Grade F 
 Example 
 Input 
 Input marks of five subjects: 95 
 95 
 97 
 98 
 90 
 Output 
 Percentage = 95.00 
 Grade A

input basic salary of an employee and calculate its Gross salary according to following: 
 Basic Salary Less than equal 10000 : HRA = 20%, DA = 80% 
 Basic Salary Less than equal 20000 : HRA = 25%, DA = 90% 
 Basic Salary > 20000 : HRA = 30%, DA = 95% 
 Example 
 Input 
 Input basic salary of an employee: 22000 
 Output 
 Gross salary = 49500

Input electricity unit charges and calculate total electricity bill according to the given condition: 
 For first 50 units Rs. 0.50/unit 
 For next 100 units Rs. 0.75/unit 
 For next 100 units Rs. 1.20/unit 
 For unit above 250 Rs. 1.50/unit 
 An additional surcharge of 20% is added to the bill 
 Example 
 Input 
 Enter total units consumed: 150 
 Output 
 Electricity Bill = Rs. 120.00
